newsArray.title: 2025/26 Ghana Premier League: Week 23 Match Preview – Basake Holy Stars vs. Swedru All Blacks – Ghana Latest Football News, Live Scores, Results
newsArray.description: Basake Holy Stars will be aiming to boost their survival hopes when they host Swedru All Blacks in a crucial Ghana Premier League matchday 23 encounter on Sunday afternoon. The fixture at the AAK II Sports Stadium in Ampain presents a golden opportunity for the Nzema-based side to further strengthen their impressive home form. newsArray.title: Playing in the Women’s FA Cup was life-changing. What makes it so special could be at risk
newsArray.description: “I’m playing in the FA Cup at the weekend.” There aren’t many people in my life I didn’t tell about getting to play in the Women’s FA Cup. Family, friends, colleagues, they all heard about it. Four months after my tier seven team, South London Women FC, were knocked out of the competition by two-time winners Fulham, I’m still talking about it. The biggest domestic knockout competition in England is open to clubs from all seven tiers in the women’s football pyramid. The top tier is the Women’s Su
creator: the athletic
